com.facebook

Interface GraphRequestBatch.OnProgressCallback

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GraphRequestBatch.Callback
    Enclosing class:
    GraphRequestBatch

    public static interface GraphRequestBatch.OnProgressCallback
extends GraphRequestBatch.Callback
    Specifies the interface that consumers of the RequestBatch class can implement in order to be notified when the batch makes progress. The frequency of the callbacks can be controlled using FacebookSdk.setOnProgressThreshold(long).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBatchProgress(GraphRequestBatch batch, long current, long max)
      The method that will be called when a batch makes progress.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.facebook.GraphRequestBatch.Callback

        onBatchCompleted

    • Method Detail

      • onBatchProgress

        void onBatchProgress(GraphRequestBatch batch,
                   long current,
                   long max)
        The method that will be called when a batch makes progress.
        Parameters:
        batch - the RequestBatch containing the Requests which were executed
        current - the current value of the progress
        max - the max (target) value of the progress
